com.tenforce.semtech.SPARQLParser.SPARQLStatements

Class ParenthesesBlock

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tenforce.semtech.SPARQLParser.SPARQLStatements.ParenthesesBlock
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IStatement
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AskBlock

    public class ParenthesesBlock
extends java.lang.Object
implements IStatement
    A ParenthesesBlock is a succession of simple statements between a starting '{' and ending '}' parentheses. It may also include a graph statement

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.tenforce.semtech.SPARQLParser.SPARQLStatements.IStatement

      • replaceGraphStatements

        public void replaceGraphStatements(java.lang.String newGraph)
        this will propagate the replacement of ALL subsequent graph statements with the new graph name. note that to remove all graph statements you can just pass an empty string as parameter
        Specified by:
        replaceGraphStatements in interface IStatement
        Parameters:
        newGraph - the name of the new graph

      • replaceGraphStatements

        public void replaceGraphStatements(java.lang.String oldGraph,
                                   java.lang.String newGraph)
        this will propagate the replacement of ALL subsequent graph statements which are equal to the oldGraph's name. All graph statements targetting other graphs will remain untouched.
        Specified by:
        replaceGraphStatements in interface IStatement
        Parameters:
        oldGraph - the name of tha graph that needs be replaced
        newGraph - the new graph name
